a.n: Mao Mao: Heroes of Pure Heart I (13)

p.k: Popularity Conquest When Mao Mao discovers that he is not as popular as Badgerclops and Adorabat they decide to reinvent him as a kinder cuddlier hero.
p.d: Mao Mao, the explosive loner, Badgerclops, the cyborg slacker, and Adorabat, the adorable sidekick overcome their differences and work together to protect the people of Pure Heart Valley from monsters, villains, and everything in between. Together, they learn that working side by side and truly understanding others is how you really make a difference and cement your place in legend.
